Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
I came here to shop, but there just wasn't
anything to buy...

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
Found me something good today. Guess
sometimes, all you need to do is look, huh?

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
Everybody knows and loves the stuff this town
produces, so this shop's got everything I need to
buy some good souvenirs.

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
I've been all over the world, but I've never seen
anything like this before! So happy to find it. ♪

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
Hmmm... This town has a good selection of
products, but they're all so expensive! I was
really hoping for something cheaper.

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
This place is so sad. Why did I end up coming
here again?

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
I'm traveling all over the world in search of
rarities. Have you seen anything...spectacular?

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
Well, this is a surprise! Wasn't expecting the
town to be so big.

<NAME_MOB_MYLENE>
I've traveled all over the world, and I can say
there are few towns as busy as this one!
